TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChartSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 启用 控件的序列化功能。

span.span: Enables serialization of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开为根的属性类。This class is exposed as the property of the root class. 序列化保存图表的状态，并还提供用于加载到图表的序列化的数据的选项。Serialization saves the state of the chart and also provides the option to load the serialized data into the chart. 可以保留所有图表属性，包括图表的数据。All chart properties can be persisted, including the chart's data. 此外，可以重置所有图表属性标记为序列化。In addition, all chart properties marked for serialization can be reset. 管理用户定义的视图状态时，可以根据需要使用此类。This class can optionally be used when managing user-defined view state. 其中一个其`Load`方法可以用于加载视图状态，以及之一`Save`时设置的视图状态，可以使用方法。One of its `Load` methods can be used to load the view state, and one of the `Save` methods can be used when setting the view state. 可序列化的存储数据的 XML 或二进制格式。The XML or binary formats can be used to store serialized data. 默认情况下，使用 XML，但你可以更改与格式属性。XML is used by default, but you can change the format with the property. 图表属性来保存和加载使用`Save`和`Load`方法，分别。Chart properties are saved and loaded using the `Save` and `Load` methods, respectively. 请注意，将保存仅使用非默认值的属性。Note that only properties with non-default values will be saved. 数据可以保存和/或加载使用文件，流处理时， ， ，和对象。Data can be saved and/or loaded using a file, stream, , , and objects. 从保存和/或加载数据使用对象的派生时， ，或类，数据的格式必须为 XML。When saving and/or loading data using an object derived from the , , or classes, the format of the data must be XML. 以下列表介绍这三种技术，从基本配置到高级，用于定义可序列化数据。The following list describes three techniques, from basic to advanced, used to define serializable data. 请注意，它也可以定义非可序列化数据。Note that it is also possible to define non-serializable data. 下一步的段落中介绍了此技术。This technique is described in the next paragraph. - 序列化使用`Save`和`Load`方法，而无需指定任何可序列化的属性。Serialize the using the `Save` and `Load` methods, without specifying any serializable properties. 使用非默认值，其中包括图表数据，所有图表属性会序列都化。All chart properties with non-default values, which includes chart data, will be serialized. - 序列化指定的图表属性属性。Serialize the chart properties specified by the property. 属性进行分组的图表属性序列化为类别，如数据、 外观和等。The property groups the chart properties to be serialized into categories such as Data, Appearance, and so forth. 请注意，名称和对象将自动序列化; 序列化的数据随后会应用于现有图表区和系列时加载。Note that the names of and objects are automatically serialized; the serialized data is then applied to existing chart areas and series when loaded. > [!IMPORTANT] > 属性实现内部控件用作属性The property is implemented internally by the control as the property - 序列化指定的图表属性属性。Serialization of chart properties specified by the property. 这是可序列化的所有图表属性的逗号分隔列表。This is a comma-separated listing of all chart properties that are serializable. 此属性设置为一个显式值之后，它负责的开发人员可以指定要保存的所有属性。After this property is set to an explicit value, it is the responsibility of the developer to specify all properties to be saved. 换而言之，与不同属性时，图表区和系列的名称不会自动保留。In other words, unlike the property, the names of chart areas and series will not be automatically persisted. 和属性还可结合使用。The and properties can also be used in conjunction. 但是，请确保时设置，否则由指定的图表属性与自身连接将重写属性。However, make sure that is concatenated with itself when being set, otherwise the chart properties specified by the property will be overridden. 若要禁止在正在序列化的某些属性，使用属性。To prohibit certain properties from being serialized, use the property. 当一个属性设置为可序列化和不可序列化时使用通配符，即常见属性的优先级。When one property is set as serializable and non-serializable, which is common when wildcards are used, the property has precedence. 但是，优先又依赖于时指定属性使用了多少通配符。However, precedence also depends on how many wildcards were used when a property was specified. 默认情况下，序列化属性重置为各自的默认值之前进行加载。By default, serializable properties are reset to their defaults before they are loaded. 可以使用更改此行为属性。This behavior can be changed using the property. 方法还可以用于显式将图表属性重置为其默认值。The method can also be used to explicitly reset chart properties to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents Content { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationContents value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要序列化的图表内容的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of chart content to be serialized.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示将在加载、保存或重置操作期间执行序列化的图表内容。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the chart content that will be serialized during a load, save or reset operation.

value.span: 默认情况下，将保留所有非默认图表属性，包括数据。

span.span: By default, all non-default chart properties, including data, are persisted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有图表属性会进行序列都化任何`Save`和`Load`调用方法。By default, all chart properties will be serialized when any of the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 若要提供更好地控制对内容进行序列化，使用属性。To provide more control over what is serialized, use the property. 请注意，和属性还可连同属性。Note that the and properties can also be used along with the property. **重要**属性确定类型的图表特征，如"外观"，要序列化，并作为内部实际实施属性。**Important** The property determines types of chart characteristics, such as "appearance", to be serialized, and is actually implemented internally as the property. 这意味着该设置属性，然后设置属性将导致属性值被重写，除非串联在一起。This means that setting the property and then setting the property will result in the property value being overridden, unless is concatenated. 请参阅此过程的示例下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 如果你设置属性，所有和对象名称将自动进行序列化; 这意味着与图表区和系列的序列化的数据，将应用于加载时的现有对象。If you set the property, all and objects names will automatically be serialized; this means that serialized data that pertains to chart areas and series will be applied to existing objects when loaded. 设置此属性将影响所有负载，保存和重置操作。Setting this property affects all load, save and reset operations.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat Format { System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::SerializationFormat value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置序列化图表时所使用的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets the format used when the chart is serialized.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，该值表示已序列化的数据的格式。

span.span: A enumeration value that represents the format of the serialized data.
The default value is XML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据可以进行序列化 XML 或二进制格式。Data can be serialized in either an XML or binary format. 二进制格式非常简洁，并采用更少的存储比 XML。Binary format is compact, and takes less storage than XML. XML，但是，是为用户可读文本格式。XML, however, is a text format that is human-readable. 当你保存或加载序列化的数据时，格式必须为 XML。When you save or load serialized data, the format must be XML.

MemberSignature.Value: protected string GetContentString (System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.SerializationContents content, bool serializable);

Protected Function GetContentString (content As SerializationContents, serializable As Boolean) As String

span.span: The serializable content.

param.name: serializable
param.span: 若要获取可序列化的字符串，则为 ；若要获取不可序列化的字符串，则为 。

summary.span: 返回可序列化或不可序列化的类和/或属性名称，可否序列化取决于具体的标志值。

span.span: Returns a serializable or non-serializable class and/or property names, depending on the specific flag value.

returns.span: 一个 值，表示可序列化或不可序列化的类和/或属性名称。

span.span: A value that represents the serializable or non-serializable class and/or property names.

value.span: 如果图表序列化程序在模板创建模式下运行，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the chart serializer is working in template-creation mode; otherwise, .

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether unknown XML properties and elements will be ignored without throwing an exception.

value.span: 如果忽略未知 XML 属性和元素而不引发异常，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unknown XML properties and elements are ignored without throwing an exception; otherwise, .

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据加载到 控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 一个从 类派生的对象，如 对象。

span.span: An object derived from the class, for example, a object.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据从派生自 类的对象加载到控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以序列化的数据加载到控件。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 加载操作发生时，序列化属性，默认情况下，第一次重置为其默认值之前它们将设置为持久的值，如果保存。When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 若要加载特定的序列化的属性，设置，或加载数据前的属性。To load specific serialized properties, set the , or properties before loading the data. 请注意，使用保存数据时`Save`方法，具有非默认值的那些属性实际序列化。Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.IO.TextReader reader) cil managed

param.name: reader
param.span: 从抽象的 类派生的读取器，如 。

span.span: A reader, such as , that is derived from the abstract class.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据从派生自 类的读取器对象加载到控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from a reader object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以序列化的数据加载到控件。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 加载操作发生时，默认情况下可序列化的属性是第一次重置为其默认值之前它们将设置为持久的值，如果保存。When a load operation occurs, by default the serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 通过设置，或可以加载属性，一组特定的属性。By setting the , or properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded. 如果你使用此定义，请注意，格式，这将由属性，必须为 XML。If you use this definition, note that the format, which is set by the property, must be XML.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(string fileName) cil managed

param.name: fileName
param.span: 用于存储序列化数据的文件的相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The relative or absolute path of the file used to store the serialized data.

param.span: 如果指定了相对路径，则该路径将是相对于当前目录的路径。

span.span: If a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.

summary.span: 将已保存到磁盘的序列化数据加载到 控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data saved to disk into the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以序列化的数据加载到控件。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 加载操作发生时，序列化属性，默认情况下，第一次重置为其默认值之前它们将设置为持久的值，如果保存。When a load operation occurs, serializable properties are, by default, first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 若要加载特定的序列化的属性，设置，或加载数据前的属性。To load specific serialized properties, set the , or properties before loading the data. 请注意，使用保存数据时`Save`方法，具有非默认值的那些属性实际序列化。Note that when data is saved using a `Save` method, only those properties that have non-default values are actually serialized.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed

param.name: reader
param.span: 要从中读取所保留的数据的对象。

span.span: An object from which to read the persisted data.

param.span: 该对象派生自 类，可以是 .NET Framework 对象或用户定义的对象。

span.span: The object is derived from the class, and can be a .NET Framework object or a user-defined object.

summary.span: 将已序列化的数据从派生自 类的对象加载到控件。

span.span: Loads serialized data into the control from an object derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以序列化的数据加载到控件。Call this method to load serialized data into the control. 加载操作发生时，默认情况下可序列化的属性是第一次重置为其默认值之前它们将设置为持久的值，如果保存。When a load operation occurs, by default serializable properties are first reset to their default values before they are set to the persisted values, if saved. 若要更改此行为，请使用属性。To change this behavior, use the property. 默认情况下，将加载所有序列化的图表属性。By default, all serialized chart properties will be loaded. 如果你设置，或可以加载属性，一组特定的属性。If you set the , or properties, a specific set of properties can be loaded. 当你使用此定义时，格式必须为 XML;格式可以更改与属性。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the property. 当你使用 XML 格式的文本文件，为了简单起见用于方法相反。When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NonSerializableContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置不进行序列化的图表属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart properties that will not be serialized.

value.span: 一个用逗号分隔的 表达式，表示不进行序列化的图表属性。

span.span: A comma-separated expression that represents the chart properties that will not be serialized.
The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下所有图表属性将都被序列化时`Save`和`Load`调用方法。By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 你可以使用属性可限制要序列化，以及使用的图表特征和属性。You can use the property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the and properties. 此属性确定不进行序列化的图表特征。This property determines which chart characteristics will not be serialized. 可以在与相同的方式在字符串表达式中，使用通配符属性。Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the property. 例如，若要排除所有图表`BackColor`属性从序列化，将此属性设置为"\*。背景色"。For example, to exclude all chart `BackColor` properties from serialization, set this property to "\*.BackColor". 有时，一个属性可以设置同时序列化和不序列化，这在使用通配符时很常见。Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. 表达式具有较低的优先级相比表达式。The expression has a lower priority when compared to the expression. 但请注意权重较低赋予使用通配符的字符串表达式。However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. 例如，如果属性设置为"\*。背景色"和属性设置为，所有 B`ackColor`以外的属性会序列化对象。For example, if the property is set to "\*.BackColor" and the property is set to , all B`ackColor` properties except for objects will be serialized. 如果属性已设置，则优先级取决于在中使用多少通配符表达式。If the property has been set, the priority depends on how many wild cards are used in the expression. 例如，设置属性将导致属性包含"*。返回\*"表达式。For example, setting the property to will result in the property containing a "*.Back\*" expression. 如果属性设置为"\*。返回\*"，则所有`Back*`图表属性如`BackColor`， `BackGradient`，依此类推，仍会进行序列化。If the property is set to "\*.Back\*", all `Back*` chart properties such as `BackColor`, `BackGradient`, and so forth, will still be serialized. 这是因为属性值具有高的优先级相比属性。This is because the property value has higher priority when compared to the property. 此属性将影响所有保存、 加载和重置操作。This property affects all save, load and reset operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重置所有标记为要进行序列化的图表属性。

span.span: Resets all chart properties marked for serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将所有图表属性重都置为其默认值。By default, this method resets all chart properties to their default values. 若要限制重置为各自的默认值的图表属性，使用，和属性。To limit the chart properties that are reset to their defaults, use the , and properties. 请注意，此方法也称为自动当`Load`使用方法和属性设置为`true`。Note that this method is also called automatically when a `Load` method is used and the property is set to `true`.

summary.span: 保存具有非默认值的图表属性。

span.span: Saves chart properties that have non-default values.

summary.span: 可以对所有图表属性进行序列化，其中包括数据。

span.span: All chart properties can be serialized; this includes data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 从 类派生的用于保存图表属性的对象，如 。

span.span: An object derived from the class, such as , that is used to save chart properties.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到派生自 类的对象。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to an object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有图表属性的非默认值，其中包括数据点，将进行序列都化，当调用此方法。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制图表特征要序列化，使用，和属性。To control chart characteristics to be serialized, use the , and properties. 如果此方法用于保存为模板的外观属性，请确保属性首先将对象设置为`true`之前调用此方法。If this method is used to save appearance properties as a template, make sure that the property of the object is first set to `true` before calling this method. 为模板的图表的序列化从序列化非模板; 以不同的方式发生模板序列化重点介绍外观属性。Serialization of a chart as a template occurs differently from non-template serialization; template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties. 当模板被序列化时，方法可以用于加载模板，以提供有关图表的外观属性。When a template is serialized, the method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart. 模板可以用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.IO.TextWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 从 类派生的用于保存图表属性的对象，如 。

span.span: An object derived from class, for example, , that is used to save chart properties.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到派生自 类的给定对象中。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有图表属性的非默认值，其中包括数据点，将进行序列都化，当调用此方法。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 来控制序列化的图表特征，使用，和属性。To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the , and properties. 当你使用此定义时，格式必须为 XML;可以用来设置格式属性。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be set with the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(string fileName) cil managed

param.name: fileName
param.span: 用于存储序列化数据的文件的相对路径或绝对路径。

span.span: The relative or absolute path of the file used to store the serialized data.

param.span: 请注意，如果指定了相对路径，则该路径将是相对于当前目录的路径。

span.span: Note that if a relative path is specified, the path will be relative to the current directory.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到给定文件中。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有图表属性的非默认值，其中包括数据点，将进行序列都化，当调用此方法。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 若要控制图表特征要序列化使用，和属性。To control chart characteristics to be serialized use the , and properties. 默认情况下以 XML 格式保存数据。By default data is saved in an XML format. 若要将数据保存为二进制格式，使用属性。To save the data in a binary format, use the property. 请注意，必须在其中存储该文件的目录启用写入权限。Note that Write permissions must be enabled for the directory in which the file is stored. 默认情况下，这是应用程序的 Bin 文件夹。By default, this is the Bin folder of the application. 如果此方法用于保存为模板的外观属性，请确保首先将属性设置为`true`之前调用此方法。If this method is being used to save Appearance properties as a template, make sure that the property is first set to `true` before calling this method. 为模板的图表的序列化从序列化非模板，继续以不同的方式，主要是因为模板序列化重点介绍外观属性。Serialization of a chart as a template proceeds differently from non-template serialization, primarily because template serialization concentrates on Appearance properties. 当模板被序列化时，方法可以用于加载模板，以提供有关图表的外观属性。When a template is serialized, the method can be used to load the template, to provide the Appearance properties for a chart. 模板可以用于模拟自定义调色板。Templates can be used to simulate custom palettes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Save(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer) cil managed

param.name: writer
param.span: 一个从 派生的用于保存 属性的对象。

span.span: An object derived from used to save properties.

summary.span: 将具有非默认值的图表数据和属性保存到派生自 类的给定对象中。

span.span: Saves chart data and properties with non-default values to the given object that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有图表属性的非默认值，其中包括数据点，将进行序列都化，当调用此方法。By default, all chart properties with non-default values, which includes data points, will be serialized when this method is called. 来控制序列化的图表特征，使用，和属性。To control which chart characteristics are serialized, use the , and properties. 当你使用此定义时，格式必须为 XML;格式可以更改与属性。When you use this definition, the format must be XML; the format can be changed with the property. 当你使用 XML 格式的文本文件，为了简单起见用于方法相反。When you work with XML format text files, for simplicity use the method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SerializableContent { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可以序列化的图表属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the chart properties that can be serialized.

value.span: 一个用逗号分隔的 表达式，表示要序列化的图表属性。

span.span: A comma-separated expression that represents the chart properties to be serialized.
The syntax is "Class.Property[,Class.Property]".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下所有图表属性将都被序列化时`Save`和`Load`调用方法。By default all chart properties will be serialized when the `Save` and `Load` methods are called. 你可以使用属性可限制要序列化，以及使用的图表特征和属性。You can use the property to limit chart characteristics to be serialized, along with the and properties. 属性确定将序列化的图表特征。The property determines which chart characteristics will be serialized. 可以在与相同的方式在字符串表达式中，使用通配符属性。Wildcards can be used in the string expression, in the same manner as the property. 例如，要序列化所有图表`BackColor`属性，将此属性设置为"\*。背景色"。For example, to serialize all chart `BackColor` properties, set this property to "\*.BackColor". 如果和/或子未指定属性，然后的所有名称和对象必须还指定以启用持久化的数据要应用于现有和对象;也就是说，你必须指定"Series.Name"和"ChartArea.Name"表达式。If and/or child properties are specified, then the names of all and objects must be also specified to enable the persisted data to be applied to existing and objects; that is, you must specify "Series.Name" and "ChartArea.Name" expressions. 请参阅此过程的示例下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 同样，如果正在使用多个图表区，属性的所有绘制还必须保存。Similarly, if multiple chart areas are being used, the property of all plotted must also be saved. 有时，一个属性可以设置同时序列化和不序列化，这在使用通配符时很常见。Sometimes, a property can be set to be both serialized and not serialized, which is common when wildcards are used. 表达式具有较低的优先级相比表达式。The expression has a lower priority when compared to the expression. 但请注意权重较低赋予使用通配符的字符串表达式。However, note that less weight is given to string expressions that use wildcards. 例如，如果属性设置为"\*。背景色"和属性设置为，所有 B`ackColor`以外的属性会序列化对象。For example, if the property is set to "\*.BackColor" and the property is set to , all B`ackColor` properties except for objects will be serialized. 如果你设置属性，属性将内部设置。If you set the property, the property will be set internally. 如果属性已设置，但另一个属性，需要进行序列化，请确保要连接属性指定该额外属性时。If the property is already set but another property needs to be serialized, make sure to concatenate the property when specifying that extra property. 请参阅此过程的示例下面的示例代码。See the sample code below for an example of this procedure. 此属性将影响所有保存、 加载和重置操作。This property affects all save, load and reset operations.
